movements.name: Lead around and back
movements.description: Lead all the way around in 8b, lead back 8b. Gents right arm over ladies right shoulder, left hands held in front. When turning to lead back, merely turn on the spot without spinning around each other.

movements.name: Ladies star
movements.description: Right hand star (or wheel) clockwise for 4 bars, reverse and left hand star back to place.

movements.name: Ladies star
movements.description: Right hand star (or wheel) clockwise for 4 bars, reverse and left hand star back to place.

movements.name: Square and House
movements.description: In waltz hold, advance toward the couple on the right, back into opposite place, house home.

movements.name: Antrim Square
movements.description: Each dancer will dance a small square as part of the overall set. Tops take inside hands and advance to the center, release hands, face their partners and reverse into side position (4b). Tops then turn toward the opposite top, back toward their original side, turn to face their partner and advance to meet their partner at home (4b). At the same time the sides face their partners, reverse away from each other, turn and advance to the opposite person (4b) turn toward the center advance toward their partner, turn toward the center and reverse to home (4b). Everyone reverse the square with side couples leading (8b).
Side couples lead the Antrim square this time.
